job_details.full_text:
Intern - Machine Learning Engineer (LLM)

Location StatementIBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is extremely brief and lacks specific details about the tasks, technologies, or responsibilities. It is titled 'Intern - Machine Learning Engineer (LLM)' which suggests a focus on ML and LLMs, but without further information, it is impossible to classify it definitively into ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. It could also be considered too vague or primarily focused on learning/internship experience rather than core engineering tasks.
